name: Monster Extermination Mission
description: • Collect and deliver 20 proof of extermination

dialogs.start: Monsters are threatening the village. Will you help with the extermination?
dialogs.monsters: Zombies, skeletons, spiders, creepers... They're all dangerous.
dialogs.proof: Bring proof of extermination and I'll reward you.
dialogs.complete: Well done! The village is safer now.
